data.system_settings: Windows 10 (x64) Build 15063.293 @ Version 1703, Discord Canary Version 0.0.158
data.actual_result: Modal doesn't close/update to Yes by default.
data.short_description: Pressing enter on modals does not close them like it used to
data.steps_to_repro: - Change the 'Allow DMs from server members' to off/on - Press enter
